title: Serverless Cafe
description: Full-stack serverless coffee shop app with React frontend on CloudFront, API Gateway–backed Lambda functions, DynamoDB persistence, and Cognito authentication for secure, pay-per-use inventory management.

title: YouTube Sentiment Analysis with MLOps & AWS CI/CD
description: End-to-end YouTube comment sentiment model with DVC pipelines, Flask prediction API, Docker containerization, and automated deploy to AWS (ECR → EC2) via GitHub Actions; includes Chrome extension for in-browser use.

title: Azure End-to-End Data Engineering Pipeline
description: Modern data pipeline ingesting on-prem SQL into Azure Data Lake Gen2 following medallion architecture, transforming with Databricks, loading into Synapse Analytics, and visualizing in Power BI, with Key Vault and Entra ID for security and RBAC.

title: Condense.ai
description: AI-powered SaaS platform utilizing LLMs to summarize PDFs and deliver visually engaging, reel-like summaries for users.

title: HealthBuddy: Bilingual RAG Healthcare Chatbot
description: Bilingual healthcare chatbot leveraging Rasa framework with RAG for medical assistance and consultations in English as well as French.

title: Duplicate Bug Report Detection using BERT & ELECTRA
description: NLP pipeline using BERT & ELECTRA transformers for duplicate bug report detection with advanced preprocessing & model fine-tuning.

title: Android Malware Detection via Heuristic Feature Selection
description: Machine learning-based Android malware detection system using heuristic feature selection techniques and advanced classification algorithms to identify malicious applications with optimized feature engineering.
